verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1129>building<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H2837>desire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he was <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%>
That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, as he had <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him at <S%H1391>Gibeon.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and your <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> that you have made <S%H6440>before<s%> me: I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H1129>built,<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H5769>ever;<s%> and my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and my <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3605>perpetually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, as <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and in <S%H3476>uprightness,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments:<s%>

Then I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> on <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> as I <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you shall at all <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> me, you or your <S%H1121>children,<s%> and will not <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, but <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them:

Then will I <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them; and this <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> will I <S%H7971>cast<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%>

And at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> which is <S%H5945>high,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> by it shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and shall <S%H8319>hiss;<s%> and they shall <S%H7725>say,<s%> <S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house?<s%>

And they shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%H2388>taken<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and have <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> them, and <S%H5647>served<s%> them: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> on them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%>

(Now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> had <S%H5375>furnished<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2656>desire,<s%>) that <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1551>Galilee.<s%>

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> him; and they <S%H3477>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> him not.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5414>given<s%> me, my <S%H251>brother?<s%> And he <S%H7121>called<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> six <S%H3967>score<s%> <S%H6242><s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>reason<s%> of the <S%H4522>levy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>raised;<s%> for to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H1507>Gezer.<s%>

For <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, and <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> it for a <S%H7964>present<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> and <S%H1032>Bethhoron<s%> the <S%H8481>nether,<s%>
And <S%H1191>Baalath,<s%> and <S%H8412>Tadmor<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4543>store<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1961>had,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2836>desired<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H776>land,<s%> whom the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also were not <S%H3201>able<s%> utterly to <S%H2763>destroy,<s%> on those did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>levy<s%> a <S%H4522>tribute<s%> of <S%H5647>slavery<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5650>slaves:<s%> but they were <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and his <S%H7991>captains,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H5324>officers<s%> that were <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> which <S%H7287>bore<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H6213>worked<s%> in the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to her <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Solomon had <S%H1129>built<s%> for her: <S%H227>then<s%> did he <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4407>Millo.<s%>

And <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings and <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> So he <S%H7999>finished<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H590>navy<s%> of ships in <S%H6100>Eziongeber,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H854>beside<s%> <S%H359>Eloth,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8193>shore<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> in the <S%H590>navy<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H582>shipmen<s%> <S%H591><s%> that had <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>
